title: my key fragments???!!!
body:
I had 2 key fragments, then I bought another with world tokens and then I forged them into a key. Now there is nothing in my loot. (key nor fragments) please help me!

-Kawasaki28{{champion:238}}

replies.body: Completed keys don't appear as a loot item, but it will still be listed towards the bottom. I do see the key on your account and you should be able to click and open that chest.
